channel.title: new info l4d/portal 2
channel.description:
these might be in the wrong area but i got you guys 2 links:
[url]https://kotaku.com/5618352/new-left-4-dead-expansion-lets-you-choose-who-will-live-or-die[/url]
and
[url]https://kotaku.com/5618339/portal-2-co+op-trailer-shows-how-teamwork-gets-things-done[/url]
my personal thoughts: second link kicks ass looks great and i didn't think they would pull off co-op so well.
first link im confused. was it not already established bill would die? :frowning: like what? now they are going back and changing that, for what?
every movie the mentor dies/ leaves first. obi wan, the professor in back to the future, that guy from blade 3, i guess in action movies the black guy could go first to though so.... either way it does not really make sense. i digress, discuss.

item.title: new info l4d/portal 2
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Rochelle actually has some funny lines, she’s just highly sarcastic so people tend to not notice.

But she doesn’t attempt to push a crowbar through some skulls, which Gordon does do. And it’s infinitely more badass than swinging it.

item.title: new info l4d/portal 2
item.dc:creator: Firepowzer
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

Valve isn’t making Episode 3, what? Their main dev team is doing the exact same thing as the BM dev team. Going into Source SDK for show, then going AFK. Game got canceled like, the day Episode 2 came out. Any artwork they show you from it is photoshopped.

:ninja:

:fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: new info l4d/portal 2
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

Yes no story at all is better then a mediocre one. Except not, as far as zombie out breaks go this one is fine and they really have yet to give depth to the story.

Exactly. The story isn’t supposed to be the amazing part of this game. It’s supposed to seem like a stereotypical zombie movie. Besides there is a lot of back info and story to the game, you just have to pay attention.

Read full topic

item.title: new info l4d/portal 2
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
DinoThrasher:

Blegh, L4D was so much better before they tried to tie all the campaigns together into one story. This attempt at a storyline is awful…

Yes no story at all is better then a mediocre one. Except not, as far as zombie out breaks go this one is fine and they really have yet to give depth to the story.

Read full topic

item.title: new info l4d/portal 2
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Bobikan00sh:

first link im confused. was it not already established bill would die?
like what? now they are going back and changing that, for what?

Bill will probably die as far as the ongoing story goes, but it’ll probably be something like “only room for 3 in the elevator to the balcony/top of the bridge!” In which case, you gotta run faster than your friends to that elevator

No Mercy in L4D2 = win.

Portal 2…eh. I wasn’t a huge fan of the first, it’s pretty cool to see what the coop characters look like, though.

Read full topic

item.title: new info l4d/portal 2
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I don’t know if a mod moved it or something but the thread is in Tech and Gaming now and its fine here.

Also we are not changing who dies in l4d2, your decision of who dies is non-canonical. The actual canon events of what happened leading up to how Bill dies will be told in the comic.

Read full topic
